General.Name: The Grob Tea Company Limited
General.Description: The Grob Tea Company Limited cultivates, manufactures, and sells tea in India. The company owns tea gardens under the names Doyang, Dessoie, Kanu, Martycherra, Pathemara, and Teen Ali tea estates located in Assam. Its gardens comprise an area of 4236.07 hectares and 2332.71 hectares of tea plantations. The company was incorporated in 1895 and is based in Kolkata, India.
